text: James David Watkins (March 7, 1927July 26, 2012) was an American politician. He was a United States Navy admiral and former Chief of Naval Operations. He served as the U.S. Secretary of Energy during the George H. W. Bush administration, also chairing U.S. government commissions on HIV/AIDS and ocean policy. Watkins also served on the boards of various companies and other nongovernmental organizations and as the co-chair of the Joint Ocean Commission Initiative. Watkins died of congestive heart failure on July 26, 2012 in Alexandria, Virginia at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:United States Secretaries of Energy Category:Military people from California Category:Scientists from California Category:Politicians from California Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: James D. Watkins
